Name: Laboratory Inventory Management for Reagents and Consumables
Description: A catalog of qualified reagent and consumable products to be used in the laboratory. Tracking of inventory usage through ‘Check-in’ and ‘Check-out’ of product items. Provide insights into inventory usage through various reports and dashboards.Track Inventory needs with a cart using redis user access privileges for add/update/deregister product using userType G0, G1 etc.
TechStacks: Formik, Yup and React Form Validation
